  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81024</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Demonstrating the strength of an electromagnet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstrieren der Stärke eines Elektromagneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démontrer la force d'un électro-aimant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstrando a força de um eletroímã</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione della resistenza di un 
elettromagnete</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της δύναμης ενός ηλεκτρομαγνήτη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostrar la fuerza de un electroimán</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates an experimental set-up to demonstrate the strength of an electromagnet using an iron rod and different weights placed in a stretched spring balance.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron rods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Strength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stretched spring balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Weights</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht eine 
experimentelle Installation, um die Stärke eines Elektromagneten mit 
einer Eisenstange zu zeigen und die unterschiedlichen Gewichte, die in
eine ausgedehnte Feder gelegt werden, gleichen aus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre une installation 
expérimentale pour démontrer la force d'un électro-aimant à l'aide
d'une tige de fer et les différents poids placés en ressort étiré 
équilibrent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra uma instalação 
experimental para demonstrar a força de um eletroímã usando uma 
haste do ferro e os pesos diferentes colocados em uma mola esticada 
balançam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra una messa a punto 
sperimentale per dimostrare la resistenza di un elettromagnete per 
mezzo di un asta del ferro ed i pesi differenti disposti in una molla 
allungata equilibrano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί μια πειραματική οργάνωση 
για να καταδείξει τη δύναμη ενός ηλεκτρομαγνήτη χρησιμοποιώντας 
μια ράβδο σιδήρου και διαφορετικά βάρη που τοποθετούνται σε μια 
τεντωμένη ισορροπία άνοιξη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra una disposición 
experimental para demostrar la fuerza de un electroimán usando una 
barra del hierro y diversos pesos puestos en un resorte estirado 
balancean.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisenstangen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stärke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ausgedehnte Frühling Balance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gewichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">électro-aimant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">tiges de fer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">équilibre étiré de ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eletroímã</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hastes do ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">contrapeso esticado da mola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettromagnete</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">coni retinici del ferro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Resistenza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bilancia dinamometrica allungata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pesi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρομαγνήτης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ράβδοι σιδήρου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεντωμένη ισορροπία άνοιξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάρη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">electroimán</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">barras del hierro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">equilibrio estirado del resorte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
